attributes.action: Bar disgraced MP's who have resigned from retaking office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No member of parliment should be given a cabinet position or seat in the house of Lord's, if that person has previously resigned, or been forced to resign due to an improper act or has been found to have lied or breeched commons house rules in relation to conduct unbecomming a minister. This brings the house into disrepute.

rejection.details:
There are several petition in existence already:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/expensesfraud/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
